short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension that makes it difficult for you to access your restricted sites list

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The ultimate productivity extension for you! Block online distractions and stay focused, the must-have productivity tool for Chrome. This extension lets you add websites to your restricted list and only allows access after completing a math problem. It's the perfect way to stay productive and get things done.
